text: Travel is booming, but the ecosystem continues to be complex & challenging for service providers Managing complex finOps in their organisation Virtual cards, payments, reconciliation, supplier,reports, enhanced data, expense management Expanding globally & staying compliant Working with local payment methods, multiple currencies, integrations, regulations Managing complex payments process and integrations Our checkout SDK makes offering any payment methods, offer, EMI option in one click Friction in payment experience for end users Decreasing drop offs, innovating quickly, managing retries, decreasing number of steps

text: INCREASE COVERAGE AND REDUCE COSTS Enable any PSP/ Acquirer/ PM with few clicks on Dashboard Work with multiple local acquirers 1 路 Take advantage of the best competitive fees available in each market 路 Work with local PSPs & PMs instead of using global PSP even for cross border transactions 2 Direct processing with Acquirers 路 Get significant cost savings by working with bank acquirers (ON-US Routing) 路 Cost based routing to route a card BIN to specific acquirer 3 Introduce Local Payment Methods 路 Provide customers with their choice of payment methods 路 Local Payment Methods are often cost effective while giving higher success rates Global PSPs and Payment methods 300+
markdown:
INCREASE COVERAGE AND REDUCE COSTS

## Enable any PSP/ Acquirer/ PM with few clicks on Dashboard

## Work with multiple local acquirers 1

<!-- image -->

路 Take advantage of the best competitive fees available in each market

路 Work with local PSPs & PMs instead of using global PSP even for cross border transactions

## 2 Direct processing with Acquirers

路 Get significant cost savings by working with bank acquirers (ON-US Routing)

路 Cost based routing to route a card BIN to specific acquirer

3 Introduce Local Payment Methods

路 Provide customers with their choice of payment methods

路 Local Payment Methods are often cost effective while giving higher success rates

<!-- image -->

text: BOOST CONVERSIONS & REDUCE FRAUD Salvage failed transactions with Payment Retries new user Silent Retries 路 If a transaction fails because of a technical reason, we retry the transaction with a different PSP. 路 Te decision whether to retry or not is based on error reason. Manual Retries 路 In case a transaction fails with a definitive error message, we redirect the user to a Payment Retry screen and nudge the user to use a different Payment Instrument For the first merchant, we retried 1,163 transactions over a 24 hr window and 798 were successful
markdown:
BOOST CONVERSIONS & REDUCE FRAUD

## Salvage failed transactions with Payment Retries new user

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

## Silent Retries

路 If a transaction fails because of a technical reason, we retry the transaction with a different PSP.

路 Te decision whether to retry or not is based on error reason.

## Manual Retries

路 In case a transaction fails with a definitive error message, we redirect the user to a Payment Retry screen and nudge the user to use a different Payment Instrument

text: BUILD CUSTOM SOLUTIONS Build a custom FRM engine & integrate with other FRM players Fraud prevention engine tailored by utilising insights from existing customer & payment method data. Build in-house Trust Score to do customer's risk profile 1 a If user has no chargeback in forthcoming 30 days, increase the score. No FRM for that customer <> card next time. b If there is chargeback, push for 2FA next time. 2 Have regular velocity checks stripe
markdown:
BUILD CUSTOM SOLUTIONS

## Build a custom FRM engine & integrate with other FRM players

Fraud prevention engine tailored by utilising insights from existing customer & payment method data.

Build in-house Trust Score to do customer's risk profile 1

a If user has no chargeback in forthcoming 30 days, increase the score. No FRM for that customer <> card next time.

b If there is chargeback, push for 2FA next time.

2 Have regular velocity checks

text: EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS Enable recurring payments Delayed capture (free cancellation period) 1 路 Authorize the transaction & block the amount during the transaction journey 路 Deduct the money only when the service is delivered (within 7 days) 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs 2 One time Mandate (free cancellation period) 路 Validate the card & customer by doing a $0 authorization 路 Once the booking window is near, invoke the recurring transaction to debit the amount 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs
markdown:
## EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS

## Enable recurring payments

## Delayed capture (free cancellation period) 1

<!-- image -->

路 Authorize the transaction & block the amount during the transaction journey

路 Deduct the money only when the service is delivered (within 7 days)

路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs

## 2 One time Mandate (free cancellation period)

路 Validate the card & customer by doing a $0 authorization

路 Once the booking window is near, invoke the recurring transaction to debit the amount

路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs
structured: EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS Enable recurring payments Delayed capture (free cancellation period) 1 路 Authorize the transaction & block the amount during the transaction journey 路 Deduct the money only when the service is delivered (within 7 days) 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs 2 One time Mandate (free cancellation period) 路 Validate the card & customer by doing a $0 authorization 路 Once the booking window is near, invoke the recurring transaction to debit the amount 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs

segments.label: section_header
segments.text: EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS

segments.label: section_header
segments.text: Enable recurring payments

segments.label: section_header
segments.text: Delayed capture (free cancellation period) 1

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Authorize the transaction & block the amount during the transaction journey

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Deduct the money only when the service is delivered (within 7 days)

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs

segments.label: section_header
segments.text: 2 One time Mandate (free cancellation period)

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Validate the card & customer by doing a $0 authorization

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Once the booking window is near, invoke the recurring transaction to debit the amount

segments.label: text
segments.text: 路 Increase the Working capital & save significant processing costs

text: EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS Offer Module to boost loyalty & sales Configure all types of offers 1 路 Offers based on Coupons, Hidden Coupons, 路 Auto-apply (No-Coupon), Multi-Coupons, Add-ons etc 2 Multiple offer constructs available 路 Instant Discounts or Cashbacks with Payment Locking for Offers 3 Apply validations to solve all use cases 路 Eligibility & Validity Checks, Offers for specific Payment Methods, Customers, Time Periods, Products etc
markdown:
EXPAND PAYMENT FLOWS

## Offer Module to boost loyalty & sales

Configure all types of offers 1

路 Offers based on Coupons, Hidden Coupons,

路 Auto-apply (No-Coupon), Multi-Coupons, Add-ons etc

2 Multiple offer constructs available

路 Instant Discounts or Cashbacks with Payment Locking for Offers

3 Apply validations to solve all use cases

路 Eligibility & Validity Checks, Offers for specific Payment Methods, Customers, Time Periods, Products etc
